rooms.roomPrompt: Weird kid - will swap any item you give her for somewhat less valuable (-5) item. Likes to give opposite item. Likes fortnite memes.
Vending machine gives one random item worth between 30-60 tokens. Cost is 50 tokens. If the rat does not have 50 tokens, the machine will take the debt by draining blood equivalent of 50 health.
Famished cat hybrid with titanium fangs. Only way out is by killing it.
Rat controls a human ratatouille style. Human needs to defeat 7 other humans in hand to hand combat or rat is killed.
Room is very hot. 96Â°C. After two minutes, high voltage current activates in floor. If rat survives, gets full room balance in tokens.
Room contains very strong electromagnetic radiation with wavelength ranges from about one meter to one millimeter, corresponding to frequencies between 300 MHz and 300 GHz.
